summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1945, for the improvement of North Eighty-third Street, in the City of Seattle, from Greenwood Avenue to Woodland Park Avenue, by constructing cement walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20120, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
